mapper.insert: insert into RESTAURANT (res_user_id, goal_id, location, restaurant_name, category, standard_time) values (#{res_user_id}, #{goal_id}, #{location}, #{restaurant_name}, #{category}, #{standard_time})
mapper.select:
select restaurant_id, res_user_id, goal_id, location, restaurant_name, category, standard_name from RESTAURANT
and location like concat('%', #{location}, '%')
and restaurant_name like concat('%', #{restaurant_name}, '%')
and category like concat('%', #{category}, '%')
